short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more accidental clicks while you're watching videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the YouTube Screen Locker Extension

Problem: Are you tired of accidental clicks and taps ruining your video watching experience? Whether it's your pet, a curious child, or just an accidental nudge from you, these interruptions can be frustrating.

Solution: Our YouTube Screen Locker is here to ensure your video sessions remain undisturbed!

Features:  
- Simple Setup - Just install the plugin, and you're ready to go. No login needed.
- Compatible with Mac, Windows, and Linux.
- Activate or deactivate the lock with a simple keyboard shortcut or a click on our logo.
- Works both in fullscreen and windowed mode.

How to Use:  
To Lock the Screen (Two ways)
- Keyboard Shortcut: Press "Ctrl + Shift + L" on Windows or "Cmd + Shift + L" on Mac while viewing a video.
- Extension Icon: Alternatively, click on the extension's icon in your Chrome toolbar.

Upon Locking
- A temporary notification bar labeled "Screen Locked" will appear at the bottom right of your screen for 5 seconds. You can make this bar reappear by hovering your cursor over that area  

To Unlock the Screen (Two ways)
- Keyboard Shortcut: Use the same keys, "Ctrl + Shift + L" on Windows or "Cmd + Shift + L" on Mac.
- Extension Icon: Click the extension icon again to unlock the screen.

******************************************************************
Changelog:
1.1 (1/8/2025)
- Fixed an issue where the status would not update when changed using the key combination for the first time.
